name: Hruska et al., Appellants, v. Gibson, Executor

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaerer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Hruska et al., Appellants, v. Gibson, Executor.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of non pros., entered in this case in the lower court, is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Eowand.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Error assigned, inter alia, was judgment of non pros., quoting record.
J. Wray Connolly, with him P. K. Jones, for appellants.
Joseph F. Mayhugh, for appellee, was not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Hruska et al., Appellants, v. Gibson, Executor.
Argued September 26, 1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaerer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
Error assigned, inter alia, was judgment of non pros., quoting record.
J. Wray Connolly, with him P. K. Jones, for appellants.
Joseph F. Mayhugh, for appellee, was not heard.
November 26, 1934:
